component.name: Steam installer
component.summary: Installer for Valve's game and content delivery system

description.p: Steam is a software content delivery system developed by Valve. There is some free software available, but for the most part the content delivered is non-free.

By installing this program, you agree to be bound by the terms of the Steam License Agreement. If you do not agree to those terms, please do not install this program. The text of the License Agreement can be viewed at https://sources.debian.net/data/non-free/s/steam/1.0.0.54-2/steam_install_agreement.txt
The agreement can be viewed at any time after install at /usr/share/doc/steam/copyright
